links.to_node: share my account with my family
Your family will be able to watch the upcoming season of Game of Thrones, bringing everyone together for a shared experience.
Your family may appreciate your willingness to share and feel closer to you as a result.
Your family's judgmental behavior may continue, causing you to feel uncomfortable and judged for your viewing choices.
Your brother may monitor and criticize your viewing habits, leading to further tension and discomfort within the family.
You may feel restricted in your own viewing choices and lose the freedom to enjoy your favorite shows without judgment.
Your relationship with your family may improve as a result of the shared account, or it may deteriorate further due to ongoing judgment and criticism.
